org.apache.flink.runtime.profiling

Interface TaskManagerProfiler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskManagerProfilerImpl

    public interface TaskManagerProfiler
    This interface must be implemented by profiling components for the task manager manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerExecutionListener(Task task, Configuration jobConfiguration)
      Registers an ExecutionListener object for profiling.
      void shutdown()
      Shuts done the task manager's profiling component and stops all its internal processes.
      void unregisterExecutionListener(ExecutionAttemptID id)
      Unregisters all previously register ExecutionListener objects for the vertex identified by the given ID.

    • Method Detail

      • registerExecutionListener

        void registerExecutionListener(Task task,
                               Configuration jobConfiguration)
        Registers an ExecutionListener object for profiling.
        Parameters:
        task - task to be register a profiling listener for
        jobConfiguration - the job configuration sent with the task

      • unregisterExecutionListener

        void unregisterExecutionListener(ExecutionAttemptID id)
        Unregisters all previously register ExecutionListener objects for the vertex identified by the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the vertex to unregister the ExecutionListener objects for

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shuts done the task manager's profiling component and stops all its internal processes.
